title: Wipe Those Feet
description: A 1972 PSA by the American Council for Cleanliness. The ’70s were such a huge chaotic mess that instead of facing the unpleasant realities of an evil President, economic turmoil, and unjust foreign wars, some people focused on things they could control… like wiping your feet!
altHero: highly stylized, minimalist versions of Wakko, Yakko, and Dot wiping their muddy feet
alt1: an outside door mat with a smile
alt2: Wakko, Yakko, and Dot walking through the woods
alt3: Wakko being yelled at by a three-headed flower
alt4: Wakko, Yakko, and Dot being yelled at by a broom
